subject: Football
Child Abuse and Neglect
lead_paragraph: The reversal was another setback for the N.F.L.’s commissioner, Roger Goodell, who had suspended the Vikings running back until at least April for disciplining his son with a switch.
snippet: The reversal was another setback for the N.F.L.’s commissioner, Roger Goodell, who had suspended the Vikings running back until at least April for disciplining his son with a switch.
